attributes.action: Show who is selling the cheapest petrol locally
attributes.additional_details: Make all petrol stations enter their current petrol prices into a central database.  Consumers should then search the database by their postcode to find the cheapest local petrol more easily.  The goal is to increase local competition between petrol stations and help to reduce fuel costs for motorists.  This idea has already been implemented by the German government, so we should learn from their experience and be able to implement this quickly and cheaply.
